General.Name: Westmount Energy Limited
General.Description: Westmount Energy Limited is a venture capital firm specializing in seed capital to small medium sized companies. The firm invests in Guyana-Suriname Basin regions. Westmount Energy Limited was incorporated in October 1, 1992 and is based in Saint Helier, Jersey.
General.Address: Forum Two, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE1 4HH
